articles.headline: Jane Fraser Has to Fix Citigroup. It Will Be a Tough Job.
articles.snippet: The incoming C.E.O. of Citi wants to take a more global approach to issues and expand banking services for poor Americans even as the bank faces pressure to get itself in shape.
articles.abstract: The incoming C.E.O. of Citi wants to take a more global approach to issues and expand banking services for poor Americans even as the bank faces pressure to get itself in shape.
articles.lead_paragraph: On Jane Fraser’s desk at Citigroup’s downtown Manhattan headquarters sits a map of Puerto Rico made from trees downed by Hurricane Maria, which devastated the island in 2017. For Ms. Fraser, the incoming chief executive of Citi, the memento is a reminder of her mission: to restore order in the midst of chaos.

articles.headline: The Vaccine Had to Be Used. He Used It. He Was Fired.
articles.snippet: Ten doses of the Covid-19 vaccine would expire within hours, so a Houston doctor gave it to people with medical conditions, including his wife. What followed was “the lowest moment in my life,” Dr. Hasan Gokal said.
articles.abstract: Ten doses of the Covid-19 vaccine would expire within hours, so a Houston doctor gave it to people with medical conditions, including his wife. What followed was “the lowest moment in my life,” Dr. Hasan Gokal said.
articles.lead_paragraph: To hear more audio stories from publishers like The New York Times, download Audm for iPhone or Android.

articles.headline: Graphic Video of Capitol Attack Leaves Emotions Raw but May Not Change Votes
articles.snippet: The terror of that day felt palpably real again as senators sitting in judgment of Donald J. Trump were forced to relive the first mass siege of the Capitol since British invaders ransacked the building in 1814.
articles.abstract: The terror of that day felt palpably real again as senators sitting in judgment of Donald J. Trump were forced to relive the first mass siege of the Capitol since British invaders ransacked the building in 1814.
articles.lead_paragraph: It was ghastly to watch, but that was the point. A rampaging crowd threatening death as it hunted the vice president and speaker of the House. Senators spinning around midstep to run for their lives. Staff members barricading themselves in an office as attackers pounded on the door. Overwhelmed police officers retreating from rioters, desperately calling for help.

articles.headline: House Lays Out Case Against Trump, Branding Him the ‘Inciter in Chief’
articles.snippet: The Democratic House impeachment managers opened their case against the former president with a narrative of his monthslong effort to overturn the election and raw footage of the Jan. 6 Capitol attack.
articles.abstract: The Democratic House impeachment managers opened their case against the former president with a narrative of his monthslong effort to overturn the election and raw footage of the Jan. 6 Capitol attack.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The House impeachment managers opened their prosecution of Donald J. Trump on Wednesday with a meticulous account of his campaign to overturn the election and goad supporters to join him, bringing its most violent spasms to life with never-before-seen security footage from the Jan. 6 Capitol riot.

articles.headline: Reddit Is America’s Unofficial Unemployment Hotline
articles.snippet: As the unemployment crisis drags on, a Reddit forum has become a place to figure out how to navigate an antiquated and disorganized system for providing people a financial lifeline.
articles.abstract: As the unemployment crisis drags on, a Reddit forum has become a place to figure out how to navigate an antiquated and disorganized system for providing people a financial lifeline.
articles.lead_paragraph: As the unemployment crisis drags on, a Reddit forum has become a place to figure out how to navigate an antiquated and disorganized system for providing people a financial lifeline.

articles.headline: The Newest Diplomatic Currency: Covid-19 Vaccines
articles.snippet: India, China, the U.A.E. and others dole out donations in countries where they seek sway. In some cases, they are sending doses despite pressing needs at home.
articles.abstract: India, China, the U.A.E. and others dole out donations in countries where they seek sway. In some cases, they are sending doses despite pressing needs at home.
articles.lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI — India, the unmatched vaccine manufacturing power, is giving away millions of doses to neighbors friendly and estranged. It is trying to counter China, which has made doling out shots a central plank of its foreign relations. And the United Arab Emirates, drawing on its oil riches, is buying jabs on behalf of its allies.
articles.byline: By Mujib Mashal and Vivian Yee

articles.headline: Shell, in a Turning Point, Says Its Oil Production Has Peaked
articles.snippet: Europe’s largest oil and gas producer said oil production would gradually decline 1 or 2 percent annually, underscoring the company’s desire to shift to greener energy.
articles.abstract: Europe’s largest oil and gas producer said oil production would gradually decline 1 or 2 percent annually, underscoring the company’s desire to shift to greener energy.
articles.lead_paragraph: Royal Dutch Shell on Thursday made the boldest statement among its peers about the waning of the oil age, saying its production reached a high in 2019 and is now likely to gradually decline.

articles.headline: Dip in Unemployment Claims Offers Hope as New Virus Cases Ease
articles.snippet: With restrictions lifting, workers in industries hard hit by the pandemic are getting a respite from layoffs, and job postings are increasing.
articles.abstract: With restrictions lifting, workers in industries hard hit by the pandemic are getting a respite from layoffs, and job postings are increasing.
articles.lead_paragraph: After a pandemic-induced spike in layoffs amid new restrictions in many states, unemployment claims are falling, helped by a drop in new coronavirus cases.

articles.headline: Christian Prophets Are on the Rise. What Happens When They’re Wrong?
articles.snippet: They are stars within one of the fastest-growing corners of American Christianity. Now, their movement is in crisis.
articles.abstract: They are stars within one of the fastest-growing corners of American Christianity. Now, their movement is in crisis.
